summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2057, for the improvement of West Sixtieth Street, from Twenty-eighth Avenue Northwest to Thirty-second Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks, crosswalks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 20609, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
